rev.model.map.generation
Interface RoutingMap

All Superinterfaces:
PrecursorDataMap
All Known Implementing Classes:
RoutingMap.RoutingInfo
public interface RoutingMap
extends PrecursorDataMap

Provides fast access for finding paths to land from sea and to sea from land (i.e. pirate behavior).

Author:
maxwelldickey
